title: Curvy Ride
description: He’s cold as ice, except when it comes to the curvy school teacher…I know better than to get involved with James “Ice” Cole.Men like him don’t go for women like me unless they want one thing…To get in my pants and then get gone.Not only is he older…he’s also a member of the Valor MC.And everyone knows what they’re about.But the man doesn’t seem to want to take no for an answer.He’s bossy and overbearing.Possessive and demanding.He’s also irresistible.There’s no escaping the pull.He draws me to him and makes me feel safe despite his reputation.I want to believe the promises he makes me.Only we’re from completely different worlds.And when those worlds collide, there’s no telling who will survive the carnage.
author: Hope Ford
